decisionTree.question: What do you want to do?

options.question: From a single value
options.description: Emits a single value and completes.

options.question: From a collection
options.description: Converts an Iterable to a Stream.

options.question: From a Future
options.description: Converts a Future to a Stream.

options.question: One by one
options.description: Applies a function to each item.

options.question: Into a new stream
options.description: Maps to a new stream and flattens.

options.question: By a condition
options.description: Only emits items that satisfy a predicate.

options.question: Taking N items
options.description: Emits first N items then completes.

options.question: Simultaneously
options.description: Emits items from multiple streams as they arrive.

options.question: Latest from each
options.description: Combines latest emissions using a function.
